cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Magnum Strike
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Apply 2 (3) Weak.
Apply 2 (3) Lock-On.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Surveillance
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.
Gain 3 m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Assault
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ascension
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 time.
cards.altDescription:
Retain.
m10robot:Inert.
Draw 1 card.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 time.

cards.name: Assault Field
cards.description: Deal 4 (6) damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle 3 Assault (+) into your draw pile.

cards.name: Attack Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 2 (3) Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Bramble
cards.description:
Gain 2 (4) m10robot:Spikes.
Gain Block equal to your m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Brief Respite
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Defense Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 2 (3) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fortify
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Channel 1 m10robot:Bit.

cards.name: Heat Seekers
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Deal 7 (10) damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

cards.name: Juggling
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.
cards.altDescription:
Draw 2 cards.
Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

cards.name: Lash
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.

cards.name: Merge
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Draw 1 card.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pile Driver
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Deal 7 (10) damage to a random other enemy.

cards.name: Prelude
cards.description:
(Retain.)
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock the next card you play 2 times.

cards.name: Returning Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
Next turn, gain 8 (11) Block.
cards.altDescription:
Gain 8 Block.
Next turn, gain 8 Block and draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Scrape Off
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Scrapper
cards.description:
Evoke your next Orb.
Gain 3 (2) m10robot:Spikes (  for each m10robot:Upgrade it had plus 3 ).

cards.name: Seeker
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On.
If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal 9 (12) damage.
cards.altDescription:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Split Beam
cards.description: Deal 3 (4) damage 2 times. When m10robot:Extracted, increase its hits by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Steel Wall
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.

cards.name: Step Up
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.
m10robot:Overclock it 1 (2) time (times).

cards.name: Support
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert. m10robot:Swappable.
Gain 6 (9) Block.
m10robot:Overclock the next card you play 1 time.

cards.name: Thermal Imaging
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 2 (3) Lock-On.
Channel 1 m10robot:Bit.

cards.name: Thorn Field
cards.description: Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies. Gain 2 (3) m10robot:Spikes for each enemy in combat.

cards.name: Tinker
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Gain 6 (9) Block.
m10robot:Upgrade the next Orb you Channel 1 time.

cards.name: Acceleration
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Extract 2 cards.
m10robot:Overclock the next 2 cards you play 2 times.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: All In
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand X  (+ 1 ) times.

cards.name: Atomize
cards.description:
Channel 2 m10robot:Bombs.
m10robot:Upgrade them 1 time.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Balance Currents
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain 3 (5) Block.

cards.name: Bitmask
cards.description:
Deal 7 (10) damage.
Channel 1 m10robot:Bit for each Attack played this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Booster
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage.
m10robot:Upgrade your next Orb 2 (3) times.

cards.name: Byte
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Deal 8 damage ( to ALL enemies).
Channel 2 m10robot:Bits.

cards.name: Cloaking
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Your next Attack deals 5 (7) additional damage.
cards.altDescription:
Retain.
Gain 6 Block.
Your next Attack deals 5 additional damage.

cards.name: Command
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage for each Channeled Orb.
If the enemy has Lock-On, m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs 1 time.

cards.name: Compile Data
cards.description:
Channel 1 m10robot:Present.
m10robot:Extract 1 (2) card (cards).

cards.name: Disable
cards.description:
Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn.
Apply 1 Weak.
cards.altDescription:
Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn.
Apply 1 Weak.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Divided Attention
cards.description: Discard 1 card at random. m10robot:Extract 3 (4) cards at random.
cards.altDescription: Discard 1 card. m10robot:Extract 3 cards at random.

cards.name: EMP
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 2 (3) Strength this turn.
Deal 3 (5) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Energy Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
If you had no Block, gain [E] .

cards.name: Engage
cards.description:
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Apply 1 (2) Lock-On.
If the enemy intends to attack, draw 1 card.
cards.altDescription:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 Lock-On.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Evasion Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy takes 3 (5) additional damage from all sources this turn.

cards.name: Extrapolate
cards.description: Whenever you m10robot:Extract a card, m10robot:Overclock it 1 (2) time (times).

cards.name: Filter
cards.description:
m10robot:Extract 1 (2) card (cards).
Swap your draw and discard piles.

cards.name: Health Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy loses 7 (10) HP.
If you have played Evasion Down this turn, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Heuristics
cards.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply 1 (2) Lock-On to a random enemy.
cards.altDescription: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply 1 Lock-On to a random enemy.

cards.name: Light Show
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Gain 6 Block.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight for each Skill played this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nibble
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Gain 4 Block.
Deal 4 damage ( to ALL enemies).

cards.name: Quick Boot
cards.description:
Innate.
Channel 3 random Orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick Repair
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
When m10robot:Extracted,
gain 7 (10) Block.

cards.name: Quick Thinking
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

cards.name: RAM Upgrade
cards.description:
Gain 1 (2) Orb slot (slots).
Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it 1 time.
cards.altDescription:
Gain 1 Orb slot.
Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it 2 times.

cards.name: Railgun
cards.description:
Lose 1 Gold.
Deal 10 (14) damage.
If the enemy has Lock-On, apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Rapid Assembly
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 2 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reroute
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.
When m10robot:Overclocked, increase its damage by 4 (6) this combat.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The first time you lose Block each turn, gain that much Block next turn.

cards.name: Robo Beam
cards.description:
Deal 3 (4) damage to a random enemy.
Repeat for every turn passed this combat.

cards.name: Rush Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Gain 6 (8) Block.
Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spike Shell
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Gain 5 (7) m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Turbo
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E] and draw 1 (2) card (cards).
cards.altDescription: Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Unstable Compound
cards.description:
Channel 1 m10robot:Bomb.
m10robot:Upgrade a random Orb 2 times.

cards.name: Wave Generator
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies. Increase this card's damage by 4 (6) this combat.

cards.name: Wide Angle
cards.description:
When you play an Attack, m10robot:Bits now hit 1 additional time.
Channel 2 (3) m10robot:Bits.

cards.name: Assembly Line
cards.description:
Channel 3 m10robot:Presents.
Exhaust.
cards.altDescription:
Channel 3 m10robot:Presents.
m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs 1 time.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Empty Buffer
cards.description:
Remove (Evoke) all your Orbs.
Gain 1 Orb slot for each Orb removed (Evoked).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Home Sweeper
cards.description: Deal 16 (20) damage to ALL enemies. Deals 2 (3) more damage per turn passed.

cards.name: Imaginary Numbers
cards.description:
For 1 turn, cards randomly cost 0 or 1.
Exhaust.
cards.altDescription:
Retain.
For 1 turn, cards randomly cost 0 or 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Immovable Object
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 30 (40) Block.

cards.name: Inversion Beam
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage to ALL enemies 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overdrive Form
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
At the start of your turn, m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 (2) time (times).

cards.name: Power Savings
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
Gain 3 (2) Weak.
At the start of your turn, gain [E] .

cards.name: Recovery Mode
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the end of your turn, gain 7 Block if you have any unspent energy.

cards.name: Reflective Shell
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker 1 time.

cards.name: Rootkit
cards.description:
Draw 2 (3) cards.
Cards drawn this way cost 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Scramble Field
cards.description:
Gain X  (+ 1 ) Strength.
ALL enemies lose
X  (+ 1 ) Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Self Destruction
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
Lose 5 HP.
m10robot:Stun the enemy.
Deal 20 (28) damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solid Witch
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spiky Plating
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 (2) m10robot:Spikes.
Channel 2 m10robot:Searchlights.

relics.name: Dual Core
relics.description: m10robot:Overclock the first card you play each combat 4 times.

relics.name: Puffer Fish
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 m10robot:Spikes.

relics.name: Third Eye
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 3 Lock-On to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Froggy
relics.description: Whenever you m10robot:Extract, Extract 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: It has a very sticky tongue.

relics.name: Searchlight Mk2
relics.description: Whenever you Channel a m10robot:Searchlight, m10robot:Upgrade it 1 time.

relics.name: UFO
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, ALL enemies lose 2 Strength for the turn.
relics.flavorText: It got lost on it's way to the jungle dance party.

relics.name: Robo Ball
relics.description: The first time you are attacked each combat, take no damage. The attacker takes the full damage instead.

relics.name: Awakened Core
relics.description: Replaces Dual Core. m10robot:Overclock the first card you play each turn 2 times.

potions.name: Overclock Potion
potions.description: Overclock all cards in your hand 2 times.

potions.name: Locking Potion
potions.description: ALL enemies lose 5 Strength this turn.

potions.name: Nullifier
potions.description: Draw 1 card. All cards in your hand cost 0 until played.

keywords.name: Bit
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP when you play an Attack. When Evoked, deals damage and applies Lock-On to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Bomb
keywords.description: Orb: Stores damage when you are attacked. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the most HP.

keywords.name: Extract
keywords.description: Move the most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Searchlight
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage when you are attacked. When Evoked, grants Spikes.

keywords.name: Overclock
keywords.description: Increases the base stats of cards by 25% until played.

keywords.name: Recoil
keywords.description: Your next attack deals 50% less damage.

keywords.name: Spikes
keywords.description:
When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.
At the start of your turn, lose Spikes if you were attacked.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: A stunned enemy does nothing this turn.

keywords.name: Swappable
keywords.description: Right Click to swap the effect of this card.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading Orbs makes them more powerful. Orbs can be upgraded any number of times.

mods.name: The M10 Robot
mods.credits:
Art Assets - 100% Orange Juice (sprites, cards)
BaseMod, ModTheSpire, and StSLib - Bug Kiooeht
Beta Testing - Spookalon
Korean Translation - Saki
Simplified Chinese Translation - Leaf_Fallen
Russian Translation - Rucodeby
mods.description: Adds M10 Robot from 100% Orange Juice.
